title: Director
description: Oversees the creative aspects of the film.

title: Screenwriter
description: Writes the script for the film.

title: Cinematographer
description: Directs the photography and camera work.

title: Composer
description: Creates the music score for the film.

title: Casting Director
description: Chooses the actors for the roles.

title: Production Designer
description: Designs the film's set and visuals.

title: Sound Designer
description: Creates the sound effects for the film.

title: Art Director
description: Supervises the artistic aspects of the film.

title: Assistant Director
description: Assists the director in the production.

title: Grip
description: Handles the film's rigging and equipment.

title: Prop Master
description: Manages the props used in the film.
